The expert: s verdict mentions that news reports indicate several active law enforcement officers have sustained injuries during the protests, but there is no information suggesting that more officers have lost their lives.
The Officer Down Memorial Page: a nonprofit organization dedicated to honoring law enforcement officers, is cited as a source that lists nine officers who have died nationwide since the protests began. None of these deaths were related to the Floyd protests.
The claim is rated as False by the exper: indicating that the evidence does not support the assertion that more than 20 police officers have died due to the riots.
